personalInfo.name: Sumit Mourya
personalInfo.description: I am a passionate AI-powered full-stack developer with expertise in TypeScript, Node.js, Next.js, NestJS and React. I specialize in building scalable server-side solutions and integrating AI technologies to create intelligent applications.

experiences.company: Innowyze Global Solution (A part of The MetroMax Group), Bengaluru, Karnataka (Remote)
description: Built core backend systems for the admin dashboard, product catalog, and promotions, supporting 10K+ monthly transactions. Added mini-games that increased session time by 35% and repeat visits by 20%.

Integrated backend APIs for popular games like Bingo Bash and Classic Casino, connecting with Scopely servers to manage live sessions and rewards for millions of users. Ensured low-latency, high-availability APIs.
Enhanced the user interface and resolved frontend issues in Fleet Drive 360 using React.js, collaborating in a Scrum team and managing tasks via Jira to ensure stable releases.

experiences.company: Innowyze Global Solution (A part of The MetroMax Group), Bengaluru, Karnataka (Remote)
description: Engineered an AI-based sales chatbot to provide 24/7 customer assistance, automate lead qualification, and shorten the sales cycle through real-time interaction and improved engagement.
Directed sprint planning and provided technical leadership to two developers, delivering features 20% faster and ensuring stable releases for the logistics platform in a high-pressure setting.

EArchitected backend services for a last-mile delivery platform using NestJS, PostgreSQL, WebSockets, and Redis. Implemented route optimization, live vehicle tracking, and automated alert systems. Boosted delivery success rate by 25%.

projects.title: AskKaka - AI-Powered Chatbot
projects.description: Multilingual AI Chatbots for Indian Businesses
